sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Card, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'


const BrandCard = ({img}) => {
  return (
    <Col
    xs="6"
    sm="6"
    md="4"
    lg="2"
    className="my-2 d-flex justify-content-center ">
    <Card
      className="my-1"
      style={{
        width: "100%",
        height: "151px",
        borderRadius: "8px",
        border: "none",
        backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF",
      }}>
      <Card.Img style={{ width: "100%", height: "151px" }} className='border' src={img} />
    </Card>
  </Col>
  )
}

export default BrandCard
